script:
1). When are the new employees scheduled to start?
Next Monday. 
My schedule is full right now.
I'm sorry you're unemployed.
2). Does the no. 3 bus stop here?
No, it does, maybe.
Yes, it comes in 10 minutes. 
The bus stop is up the road.
3). I can't believe the price of eggs these days.
The sale was yesterday.
I know, it's incredible. 
Two dozen, please.
